column4: anyone have any idea why every hour I get a bunch of kernel messages that seem to indicate kernel logging has stopped and is restarting?
such as Nov 23 06:00:04 nas kernel: Kernel logging (proc) stopped.

Some users mistook this for a new project can be used as live cd plus italian language traslations ubuntu mini remix  a fully working ubuntu livecd containing only the kernel to make linux applications easy to use the same as an efficient variant.
